title: 7N Ramayana
description: A spiritually enriching journey through Sri Lanka’s sacred Ramayana trail. Explore mythical sites like Ravana’s cave, Ashok Vatika, and the temples of Nuwara Eliya and Trincomalee, weaving a tapestry of culture, legend, and devotion. This itinerary is perfect for travelers seeking a deeper connection with ancient stories and divine landscapes.

itenerary.activity: Arrival in Colombo International Airport/Visit Kelaniya Buddhist Temple/Panchamuga Anjaneyar Temple/City tour
Visit Rumassala/Ussangoda/Head to Kataragama and check into hotel
Visit Kataragama temple/Visit Ravana caves and falls/Visit Sita Amman Temple and Hakgala Garden
Visit Gayathri Peedam/Visit Sri Bhakta Hanuman Temple on Ramboda hills
Visit Temple of the Tooth Relic/Head to Trincomalee via Dambulla/Visit Dambulla Cave Temple
Visit Thirukoneswaram Temple/Head to Anuradhapura/Visit Ancient City
Visit Munneswaram & Manavari Hindu Temples/Check in to hotel
Head for departure

title: 7N Luxury
description: Indulge in the ultimate island escape with curated luxury at every stop. From scenic hot-air balloon rides over Sigiriya to private safaris in Yala and exclusive beach cruises in Weligama, this tour offers sophistication, relaxation, and once-in-a-lifetime experiences across Sri Lanka’s most elite destinations.

itenerary.activity: Arrival in Colombo International Airport/Head to Kandy/Check in early/Visit the Temple of the Tooth Relic for the evening ceremony
Check out/Head to Sigiriya via Dambulla/Visit Dambulla Royal Cave temples/Enjoy all inclusive treatments
Morning Hot air balloon tour/Climb the Lion Rock of Sigiriya for Sunset
Take domestic flight to Weerawila/Check in to hotel/Evening safari in Yala National Park
Checkout and head to Weligama/Evening cruise
Whale Watching in Mirissa/Evening at leisure/Attend a beach party at night
Day at leisure/Check out/Head to Colombo/Check in/Evening city tour and shopping/Farewell dinner
Leave for departure

title: 14N Eco & Adventure
description: An immersive eco-adventure through Sri Lanka’s hidden gems. Trek waterfalls in Riverstone, live alongside indigenous Veddha communities, canoe in scenic lagoons, and explore lush national parks. This experience-rich itinerary is perfect for adventurous souls who thrive in nature and seek authentic cultural encounters.

itenerary.activity: Arrival in Colombo International Airport / Head to Sigiriya / Climb Sigiriya rock fortress
Visit Polonnaruwa (Palaces and temples) / Visit Dambulla Cave Temple
Head to Matale / Waterfall trek, Riverstone hill, and Pitawala Pathana Plains trek (Knuckles Mountains) / Picnic lunch / Head to Wasgamuwa
Morning safari in Wasgamuwa national park / Head to Veddha Village / Lunch at Veddha Village / Jungle trek with Veddhas / Dinner and overnight stay at Veddha Village
Breakfast at Veddha Village / Trek to scenic waterfall with picnic lunch / Check in to the lakeside camp

Ride a catamaran in the Sora Bora Tank to watch the sunrise and enjoy an outdoor breakfast / Head to Knuckles / Enroute trekking expeditions (tea plantation, pine forest, typical Kandyan village, and rice fields) / Dinner and overnight stay at Knuckles Mountain Camp
Breakfast at the camp / Waterfall trek and swim at the base of the waterfall / Head to Kandy
Breakfast / Head to Kitulgala / Lunch at Kitulgala Adventure Camp / Stream slides and confidence jumps at Adventure camp / White water rafting
Head to Hatton / Scenic train ride to Haputale / Head from Haputale railway station to Ella
Trek through central highlands (rainforest patch, railroads, tunnels, scenic and remote tea estates) / Dinner and overnight stay at remote home stay
Boat safari at Gal Oya national park / Boat safari in the largest lake of Sri Lanka at dusk
Jeep drive through the jungle to Nilgala river / Lunch at Gal Oya hotel / Relax and leisure walk around the lodge
Head to Yala national park / Check into the campsite / Afternoon safari at Yala National Park
Morning safari at Yala National Park / Check out from camp / Head to Mirissa / Whale watching trip

title: 12N SL Lesser Known
description: Delve into Sri Lanka’s off-the-beaten-path wonders—from rafting in Kitulgala to sunrise climbs at Adam’s Peak, tea trails in the highlands, and secluded wilderness at Gal Oya. This itinerary celebrates serene nature, spiritual peaks, and rural charm for those looking beyond the typical tourist trail.

itenerary.activity: Arrival in Colombo International Airport / Head to Colombo / Afternoon at rest / Evening city tour of Colombo
Check out of hotel / Head to Kitulgala / Raft in the white waters of Kitulgala / Evening forest walk
Head to Nallathanniya via Ginigathena / Visit the Aberdeen Falls / Check in to hotel / Have an early dinner and sleep before the midnight hike to Adam’s Peak
Watch the sunrise from Adam’s Peak / Have breakfast and rest / Explore the picturesque surroundings and old churches nearby
Have breakfast and check out / Visit a tea estate and pluck your own tea / Witness tea manufacturing / Board a scenic train from Hatton to Ella – visit the Nine Arches Bridge / Head to Gal Oya
Morning jungle trek with a Veddha / Return to hotel for lunch / A boat safari in the largest lake of Sri Lanka at dusk
Check out of hotel after breakfast / Head to Mahiyangana / Check in to the hotel / Visit Dambana the chief Veddha Village and learn about their way of life

Ride a catamaran in the Sora Bora Tank to watch the sunrise and enjoy an outdoor breakfast / Check out of hotel / Head to Knuckles / Visit Gerandi Ella on the way / Check in to hotel / Explore the surrounding at leisure
Hike to Meemure Village and bathe in a natural pool / Return to hotel and check out / Head to Polonnaruwa / Check in to hotel / Night walk to see the slender loris
Explore Polonnaruwa on a bike / Lunch at a local restaurant / Head to Habarana / Check in to hotel / Hike Pidurangala rock at dusk
Check out of hotel and head to Kalpitiya / Visit the Ritigala Forest Reserve on the way / Visit the Anavilundawa RAMSAR Wetland Sanctuary / Check in to hotel

title: 10N Honeymoon
description: A romantic getaway crafted for unforgettable memories. From couple’s spa treatments and private sunrise climbs at Sigiriya to sunset sails and intimate cultural encounters, this itinerary blends romance, relaxation, and adventure across Sri Lanka’s most charming destinations.

itenerary.activity: Arrival in Colombo International Airport / Head to Bentota / Private candlelit dinner on Bentota Beach
Couples’ Ayurveda massage at Spa Ceylon / Sunset cruise on the Madu River (with champagne) / Handwritten love notes delivered via butler service
Head to Sigiriya / Private sunrise Sigiriya climb (avoid crowds, picnic at the top) / Hot-air balloon ride over Dambulla (with champagne toast)
Elephant bathing experience (ethical sanctuary) / Jungle bubble bath under the stars / “Love Lock” ceremony at Pidurangala Rock
Temple of the Tooth at golden hour (private blessing) / Tea-tasting for two at Handunugoda Tea Estate
Personalized horoscope reading by an astrologer / Kandyan dance show (VIP front-row seats) / Train ride to Ella (reserved first-class seats, scenic views)
Private hike to Little Adam’s Peak (sunrise picnic) / Visit Nine Arches Bridge (exclusive photo session) / “Wish lantern” release at sunset
Cooking class (learn Sri Lankan love recipes) / Hot tub under the stars with mountain views
Head to Tangalle / Private beach dinner with torches & violin music
Whale watching (private yacht charter) / Ayurvedic couple’s massage by the ocean / Sunset horseback ride on Goyambokka Beach
Morning at leisure / Check out of hotel and leave for departure

title: 6N Eco & Adventure
description: An energizing journey through Sri Lanka’s eco-rich heartland. Canoe along tranquil rivers, cycle through rural trails, and scramble through forested paths in Sigiriya. This tour is perfect for eco-conscious travelers and nature lovers seeking an active getaway immersed in community, wildlife, and raw natural beauty.

itenerary.activity: Arrival in Colombo International Airport / Head to Negombo / Dinner and overnight stay at Hotel
Ranweli river expedition (canoe/motor boat) / Head to Hotel / Traditional Sinhalese lunch / Lake expedition (canoe) / Cookery class with local experts
Breakfast / Cycle trail adventure / Lunch / Relax/ Leisure walk
Head to Sigiriya / Relax at hotel
Nature trail (Forest walk/ boulder scramble/ caving/ stream hike) / Lunch / Stream trek and swim in natural pool
Breakfast / Cycle to Sigiriya rock & climb Sigiriya rock fortress / Return to hotel and freshen up / Head to Negombo
Head for departure

title: 6N Classic
description: A quintessential exploration of Sri Lanka’s cultural and natural highlights. From the ancient cities of Anuradhapura and Sigiriya to the hill country charm of Ella and wildlife in Yala, this itinerary offers a balanced blend of history, heritage, and adventure—ideal for first-time visitors.

itenerary.activity: Arrival in Colombo International Airport/Head to Habarana/Check in to the hotel/Evening at leisure
Go to Anuradhapura in the morning/Explore Anuradhapura on a bike/Return to the hotel/Climb the Lion Rock of Sigiriya for the Sunset

Morning at leisure/Leave for departure

title: 6N Beach
description: A sun-soaked tropical escape along Sri Lanka’s golden coastline. Surf Narigama Beach, snorkel coral reefs, hike to hidden jungle beaches, and whale-watch off the southern shores. This itinerary is a haven for beach lovers, water sports enthusiasts, and anyone seeking seaside serenity with a touch of adventure.

itenerary.activity: Arrival in Colombo/Head to Bentota/Beach/Water sports/Sunset cruise
Head to Hikkaduwa/Surf at Narigama Beach/Snorkel with turtles

Whale watching/Sunset at Coconut Tree Hill
Visit secret beach/Beachfront dining
Morning at leisure/Departure

title: 5N Adventure
description: An adrenaline-packed journey across Sri Lanka’s mountainous and wild terrains. White-water raft and mountain bike in Kitulgala, zipline over Ella, and go on safari in Udawalawe. Designed for thrill-seekers and nature adventurers, this trip delivers high-energy experiences with breathtaking scenery.

itenerary.activity: Arrival in Colombo International Airport/Head to Kitulgala/River bath at Kitulgala Adventure Camp/Lunch at Kitulgala Adventure Camp/Rain forest trail, stream slide, and confidence jumps

Breakfast/Head to Udawalawa National Park/Check in at Safari Camp/Lunch/Safari at 3 PM/BBQ dinner and overnight

title: 19N Classic
description: The ultimate grand tour of Sri Lanka, covering nearly every corner of the island. From curd-making and canoeing in traditional villages to surfing in Arugam Bay, tea tasting in Ella, and safari in Wilpattu—this itinerary offers a deep, immersive dive into Sri Lanka’s diverse cultures, landscapes, and lifestyles.

title: 13N Wildlife & Birding
description: A paradise for wildlife lovers and birdwatchers. Explore Sinharaja rainforest, Yala’s big cats, and the wetlands of Bundala. With full-day safaris and guided trails, this journey is designed for those passionate about biodiversity, conservation, and close encounters with Sri Lanka’s wild residents.

title: 13N Wildlife
description: A deep dive into Sri Lanka’s rich natural habitats. Witness dolphins in Kalpitiya, elephants in Habarana, and leopards in Wilpattu, all while enjoying immersive safaris and serene jungle retreats. This itinerary caters to eco-travelers and wildlife enthusiasts seeking intimate experiences in nature.

title: 11N Classic
description: A cultural odyssey through Sri Lanka’s ancient cities and northern treasures. Experience Wilpattu’s wildlife, Jaffna’s Tamil heritage, and the ruins of Anuradhapura. This tour bridges the island’s diverse histories and landscapes, offering a profound sense of connection to its past and present.

title: 13N Classic
description: Journey through the heart of Sri Lanka’s heritage—from Wilpattu’s wetlands to Jaffna’s vibrant temples and Anuradhapura’s sacred ruins. Ideal for culture-curious travelers, this itinerary offers meaningful experiences, local interactions, and a panoramic view of Sri Lanka’s soul.
